body:
I want to start recording avicus videos and just want some ideas.

Current Ideas: (Suggested)

  • Do a different position every video. (Rusher, Frontlines, Defense, etc...)
  • Teamspeak karaoke with Jess (FrostedCupcakez).
  • Challenges.
  • Similar videos to Violentboo.
